channel.title: Expedition – Spearmex
channel.description: Luxury Fishing & Spearfishing adventures in Punta Mita, Nayarit Mexico

item.title: Sunset Cruise
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: Bask in the luxury of our yachts while you enjoy nature’s finest reminder of the here and now... the gentle slipping of the sun into the ocean.
item.content:encoded:
Sail aboard our yachts and toast to the closing of another day in paradise. The full bar and gourmet appetizers only add to the culmination of beauty for the senses as you enjoy the gentle sound of waves against the shoreline and the subtle smell of salt in the air

  • Premium Spirits, Domestic Beers and Wine
  • Cold Cuts and Cheese Platter
  • Fresh Sashimi
  • Seasonal Ceviche
  • Well Drinks (Bottled Water and Sodas)

Enjoy the Pacific sunset as it brings a gamma of oranges and pinks to the landscape’s deep ocean blues and tropical jungle greens. Revel in the unique perspective that only being on the ocean can offer

Features

  • Full Snorkel gear
  • Sportfishing gear provided upon request
  • Photos via GoPro
  • Safety gear on every boat (life jackets and marine first aid kit)
  • Specially trained, bilingual and experienced deckhands and Captain

item.title: Snorkel & Cruising
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description:
Water Toys on Four Wins 31"
Explore this beautiful Mexican paradise in style!
item.content:encoded:
Relax and live it up while you cruise the north side of the bay, enjoying the beautiful island views and watching the underwater marine life and our seasonal whales (From December to March) and enjoy our water activities we have for you Like Snorkel, Floating Mat and ride a Ocean Donut in the pristine waters of the Punta Mita reefs.

Food:

  • Pastries (Banana Bread)
  • Tropical Fruit,
  • Snacks (Veggie Chips, Pretzels, Organic Chips, Peanuts),
  • Fresh Ceviche and Sashimi,
  • Cheese and Cold Cuts Platter

Water

  • San Pellegrino Sparkling Mineral Water (Flavors: Natural, Lemonade, Orange, Clementine)
  • Electrolites
  • National Beers
  • Premium Tequila, White Wine (Sauvignon Blanc) and Prosecco
  • Regular and Diet Coke
  • For Kids Apple and Berries Juices.

item.title: Jet Ski & Tow Sports
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: Enjoying tow sports from our JetSki has never been easier thanks to three exclusive features including the retractable LinQ ski pylon, ski mode, and wakeboard rack.
item.content:encoded:
Sea Doo Wake Pro 230

Enjoying tow sports from our JetSki has never been easier thanks to three exclusive features including the retractable LinQ ski pylon, ski mode, and wakeboard rack.

The first fully-integrated waterproof Audio System will keep the fun going anywhere you go, standard with 100 watts of total system power, fully-waterproof performance, Bluetooth connectivity, and external playback controls to ensure the perfect song is always on!

KEY FEATURES

  • BRP Audio – Premium Soundsystem
  • Direct-access front storage
  • Watertight phone compartment
  • Boarding Ladder

ACTIVITIES AVAILABLE

FOIL SURFING

Foilsurfing shifts that paradigm and completely redefines what kind of wave will get your heart racing.

Your first foilsurfing lesson takes place in the waterway where the water is flat, so you can learn the basics of riding a foilboard. Once you’ve got the hang of foiling in flat water, we will advance you to the next step by taking you out into the ocean where we’ll begin towing into ocean swell.

This is where you will learn how to catch and ride the swell energy and begin to learn the mechanics of pumping the foil to stay on the swell.

WIND FOILING

Windfoiling is relatively easy to learn, especially if you already know how to windsurf. The first few runs will be challenging as you need to get used to controlling the foil with small body movements. Pretty quickly you will finally understand the influence of your body weight and find the right position on your board.

Windfoiling is also far less physically demanding than windsurfing. Since you’ll be flying above the sea, there is no friction between the water and your board. The hydrodynamic drag is minimal and you don’t get battered around by the waves.

This makes windfoiling suitable for everybody, regardless of age or gender.

WAKE FOILING

Learning to how to foil is easy when you book a lesson with one of our experienced and knowledgeable coaches. Trying to figure it out on your own, on the other hand, can be a deeply intimidating and frustrating experience. When you learn with us, we’ll get you up on the foil the faster and safer way. Getting your first rides behind a jet ski dramatically simplifies and accelerates the learning curve.

Instead of guessing and learning by trial and error, our coaches will teach you the mechanics of foiling through a gradual progression on equipment that makes it as easy and safe as possible. Whether you are interested in foiling with a kite, a boat, or in the waves, we can get you where you want to go.

WAKEBOARDING

The wake board is another popular choice on the water and you don’t have to be able snowboard or water ski to enjoy wakeboarding. It’s a sport that provides a sense of achievement and thrills even for even complete novices. Do not miss the opportunity of a Wakeboarding sesion.

Allow yourself to relax allows your body to make changes and shift weight far easier than if you are tensed up. Before you are towed, you will start with the cable in hand and your knees drawn up as far as possible to your chest. Your arms should be stretched out in front of you.

Wakeboarding is all about going with the flow; once you feel the cable being pulled, allow yourself to roll forward slightly and keep your knees locked as your speed increases. Before you know it, you will be standing upright!

DONUT RIDING

An inflatable tube which is designed to be like a donut is towed behind a watercraft. Immerse yourself in the experience of speed and thrill as you glide on the water. You not only get to be on the Donut while having a time of your life but you’ll also be able to soak in the amazing coastline.

This amazing activity shouldn’t be missed especially by those who live for the high speed and thrill. With its twist and turns, high speed, it’ll surely test your strength while having the wildest ride of your life.

Our donut ride is a great choice for anyone new to watersports. It is also an amazing way to introduce young kids to the world of watersports. As this activity is suitable for everyone, we take extra measures for children and new adventurers.

item.title: Coastal Foraging
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: Join our marine biologist/guide and Four Seasons chef for a coastal walk in search of edible sea life amongst a world of sea stars and seaweed... native swimmers and scuttlers.
item.content:encoded:
Reading the seasons, timing the tides, and knowing your sea life can reveal a smorgasbord of healthy food for foraging. With the help of your guide and chef, you too can learn to recognize valuable sea life, learn their uses, and get to know some key recipes.

Gathering and consuming wild plants and animal instills a greater respect for the environment that is their home. This experience reconnects us to the origins of our food and vividly illustrates our dependance on nature for our survival. You will not need to get into the ocean to take part in this empowering experience; however water shoes will be provided.
Step away from online recipes and store bought ingredients and into the forgotten reality that the earth provides everything we need.

item.title: Scuba Diving Excursions
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: Our certified and experienced PADI dive staff will lead you through the dive experience of a lifetime and assure that not a single encounter goes missed. Travel out of the protected bay and into the open ocean in style and comfort aboard our custom dive fleet.
item.content:encoded:
The stuff scuba dreams are made up…

These offshore dive sites offer both virgin reefs and pelagic big life encounters worthy of Nat Geo documentary footage; Schooling Tuna flying past, reefs swarming with sea turtles, Humpback whale mothers introducing their calves to the world, reef sharks resting within the volcanic nooks, giant manta rays visiting the reefs’ cleaning stations to be service by the most intricately colored tropical fish, even the tiniest most delicate sea horse as they hold the reef into which they seem to the untrained eye to disappear.

Our certified and experienced PADI dive staff will lead you through the dive experience of a lifetime and assure that not a single encounter goes missed. Travel out of the protected bay and into the open ocean in style and comfort aboard our custom dive fleet.

Our Dive Sites:

  • El Morro
    Vertical pinnacles rising from the depths of over 100 feet providing a setting for almost unimaginable Marine life encounters.
  • La Corbeteña
    Two spectacular seamounts where are the biodense reef touches the open ocean….where pelagic giants intimately meet delicate reef life.
  • El Banco
    Three underwater seamounts that lie deep enough to leave an interrupted flow of pelagic life that seem to fly overhead.
  • Tres Marias Islands
    Jewell of the Mexican pacific, the Tres Marias Island chain boast unadulterated reefs, giving us a peek into underwater world that once was.

item.title: Discover Spearfishing
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: Dive into the food web and experience the thrill of the underwater hunt. Our discover spearfishing is an extraordinary excursion for families and friends alike.
item.content:encoded:
You slide into the water as quietly as possible and take in the new world around you. Man, woman, girl, or boy; you are now a predator. You know your environment, recognize your prey, and have the underwater skills and cunning to bring your fish to the surface on a single breath.In an increasingly more interdependent society, who doesn’t daydream of a simple and direct relationship with our food; of recognizing our place in the earth’s order, embracing our primal nature, and celebrating the autonomy of a successful hunt and delicious meal.

Spearfishing, or underwater hunting, is fishing’s most selective and engaging practice; the only fishing style in which one can cross the threshold of the oceans surface to become an active part of the underwater ecosystem; blending enjoyment and exercise into a true ‘ocean to table’ experience.

Great for families, this Discover Spearfishing excursion is a life changing family activity that introduces your children to the complete energy cycle giving them skills and appreciation to last a lifetime.

Our trained spear divers will take you through the basics of underwater hunting. You will learn how to safely operate your spear and equipment, distinguish the edible fish of our reef areas, and develop the cunning and the underwater skills to stalk and shoot your first underwater catch.

Features

  • 3-hour expedition
  • HD photography and videos by GO PRO
  • Drinks (bottled water, electrolit® drinks, sodas)
  • Safety gear on every boat (life jackets and marine first aid kit)
  • Specially trained, bilingual and experienced Captain and Deckhands

item.title: Blue Water Hunting
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: This excursion is the perfect combination of on-board luxury and raw adrenaline as we head into the world class fishing waters of Pacific Mexico for the ultimate open ocean spearfishing adventure.
item.content:encoded:
Our most outstanding experience, the Blue Water Hunting expedition is unlike any other. Offshore is where fish stories need no exaggeration… Dozens of Mahi-mahi circling under a driftwood log, Marlin moving in and out of a bait ball, Yellow fin Tuna schools barreling past as you dive into the open blue… and of course the pure adrenaline rush of a thrilling and successful hunt.Explore the crystal clear offshore waters of the Mexican Pacific, home to some of the healthiest fishing grounds in the world teeming with yellow fin tuna, mahi-mahi, wahoo, and more. Gain an extra edge as our RIFFE team’s professional diver, Sebastian Melani, shares his personal tips on equipment use, dive techniques, and the local area, conditions, and game.

Our fully equipped boats and seasoned team of free divers and captains will assure a first-class experience. Enjoy freshly made ceviche from the day’s first catch prepared by our chef and paired with our specially made seasonal fruit drinks as part of our Patron Experience.


Yellowfin Tuna/Atun Amarilla


Mahi Mahi/Dorado


Wahoo/Wahoo

Features

  • 8 hours expedition
  • Welcome kit (soft cooler, reusable water bottle, waterproof phone case)
  • HD photography and videos by GO PRO
  • Melton tackle, Fish Cleaning , Vacuum Sealing and Deep Freeze catch
  • Drinks (bottled water, electrolit® drinks, sodas) and snacks (chicken wraps, fruits selection and cookies)
  • Safety gear on every boat (life jackets and marine first aid kit)
  • Specially trained, bilingual and experienced Captain and Deckhands
  • Patron Experience
  • Fresh ceviche and/or sashimi on board

item.title: Inshore Spearfishing
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: Tropical reefs, thrilling spear opportunities, sunrises/sunsets, and family fun; this spearfishing excursion is chock full of memorable adventure for all.
item.content:encoded:
Explore the area’s rich reef ecosystems in search of gourmet fish species… many not often found on the commercial market… while also enjoying the dynamic volcanic reef structures and tropical marine fauna. Up your game with valuable local knowledge from our spear guides on the reef’s edible fish, their behavior and terrain, and the appropriate gear and techniques for each species. Refine your camouflage and ambush techniques while searching the reef’s caves for delicious snapper species… or get into the action as jacks or Spanish mackerels raid the reef edge.

This half-day excursion is excellent for the whole family and/or groups of friends. For the best hunting opportunity, either head out at dawn for an early morning on the reef or enjoy the prime-time afternoon hours complete with a spectacular Pacific sunset on the ride back to port.

Topping off this well-rounded adventure are luxury amenities including fresh ceviche prepared from your first catch accompanied by seasonal fruit drinks, all compliments of our Patron Experience.

A spearfishing adventure for all to remember!

Features

  • 4 hours expedition
  • Welcome kit (soft cooler, reusable water bottle, waterproof phone case)
  • HD photography and videos by GO PRO
  • Melton tackle, Fish Cleaning , Vacuum Sealing and Deep Freeze catch
  • Drinks (bottled water, electrolit® drinks, sodas)
  • Safety gear on every boat (life jackets and marine first aid kit)
  • Specially trained, bilingual and experienced Captain and Deckhands
  • Patron Experience
  • Fresh ceviche and/or sashimi on board

item.title: Inshore Fishing
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: Packed with adventure and sprinkled with luxury, this in-shore fishing excursion boasts an unforgettable adventure for the whole family.
item.content:encoded:
While serious enough for experienced anglers to enjoy, this half-day expedition is ideal for families or groups looking for a casual or first-time fishing adventure. Balancing exhilarating fishing action with a leisurely cruise, this trip has something for everyone to enjoy.

Seasonal changes offer an enormous diversity of local marine fauna to appreciate throughout the year. Cruise Punta Mita’s coastal waters pursuing everything from jumping Spanish Mackerels and tasty Mahi-Mahi to tenacious Roosterfish (catch & release species) and reef dwelling Snappers.

Our expert fishing staff and finest equipment insure a rewarding catch and gripping adventure for all. Onboard amenities add a touch of luxury to this trip, making it a delightful excursion for the entire family. Enjoy a ceviche prepared with your first catch of the day and paired with our exclusive Patron Experience signature drinks as you revel in the natural wonders of the Pacific.

Features

  • 4 hours expedition
  • Welcome kit (soft cooler, reusable water bottle, waterproof phone case)
  • HD photography and videos by GO PRO
  • Drinks (bottled water, electrolit®, sodas)
  • Safety gear on every boat (life jackets and marine first aid kit)
  • Specially trained, bilingual and experienced Captain and Deckhands
  • Patrón Experience
  • Fresh ceviche and/or sashimi on board

item.title: Big Game Fishing
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: A day-long, new exciting family adventure where you can catch your next big fish in the most spectacular offshore locations of Punta Mita. An adventure worthy of world record breaking.
item.content:encoded:
This excursion is a must for any serious sportfishing angler looking for their next big catch. World Renowned in the fishing world, Punta Mita has welcomed numerous tournaments and repetitively boast world record catches. Sebastian Melani and his seasoned team at Spearmex offer a premier big game fishing adventure in luxurious style.

Visit offshore locations teeming with marlin, sailfish, yellow fin tuna, mahi-mahi, and more. Our fully equipped boats and professional team assure the very best chances for the catch of a lifetime. All of our expeditions are preformed with respect for the environment and billfish species are managed as catch and release only.

The Spearmex team caters to all, from the novice to the most experienced angler, making this a welcome expedition for family and friends. Enjoy top-notch amenities including gourmet ceviche or sashimi prepared from the day’s first catch by your personal chef and accompanied by our Patron Experience signature drinks.

Spearmex brings luxury into wild Pacific waters to create an unsurpassed deep-sea fishing adventure!

Features

  • 8-hour expedition
  • Welcome kit (soft cooler, reusable water bottle, waterproof phone case)
  • HD photography and videos by GO PRO
  • Melton tackle, fish cleaning , vacuum sealing and deep freeze catch
  • Drinks (bottled water, electrolit, sodas) and snacks (chicken wraps, fruits selection and cookies)
  • Safety gear on every boat (life jackets and marine first aid kit)
  • Specially trained, bilingual and experienced Captain and Deckhands
  • Patron Experience
  • Fresh ceviche and/or sashimi on board
